name: Brick Breaker (itch) (D-Studios)
description:
This is a simple project for the Game Development Club at American High School! This game is based on Brick Breaker. Move the mouse left and right to move the player paddle.
Try to destroy all the bricks and prevent the ball from falling below the screen.
Here are the links to how to create the project:
